| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line331](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line331 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

A cockatoo is a new domestic monster in the [Lethe patch](/wiki/Lethe_patch "Lethe patch") and [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). It can be tamed with [vegan](/wiki/Vegan "Vegan") food, but it does not make a terribly good pet. Although comparable to a [kitten](/wiki/Kitten "Kitten") or [little dog](/wiki/Little_dog "Little dog"), it cannot [grow up](/wiki/Grow_up "Grow up").

It cannot fly, strangely enough. Do not displace it into water or lava!

## Sounds

Cockatoos share with [parrots](/wiki/Parrot "Parrot") an interesting array of sounds when #chatted to; see that article for more information.
html:
Cockatoo

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
c cockatoo
Difficulty 4
Attacks Bite 1d4
c cockatoo
Difficulty 4
Attacks

Bite 1d4

Base level 3
Base experience 31
Speed 15
Base AC 6
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 75
Nutritional value 30
Size Small
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A cockatoo:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is herbivorous.
  • can be tamed by feeding.
  • wanders randomly.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • normally appears in small groups.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line331

A cockatoo is a new domestic monster in the Lethe patch and SLASH'EM. It can be tamed with vegan food, but it does not make a terribly good pet. Although comparable to a kitten or little dog, it cannot grow up.

It cannot fly, strangely enough. Do not displace it into water or lava!

Sounds

Cockatoos share with parrots an interesting array of sounds when #chatted to; see that article for more information.

A cockatoo is a new domestic monster in the [[Lethe patch]] and [[SLASH'EM]].  It can be tamed with [[vegan]] food, but it does not make a terribly good pet. Although comparable to a [[kitten]] or [[little dog]], it cannot [[grow up]].

It cannot fly, strangely enough.  Do not displace it into water or lava!

==Sounds==

Cockatoos share with [[parrot]]s an interesting array of sounds when #chatted to; see that article for more information.
